page.title: 20EDUCATION IN BUCKIE
page.content: WITHIN THE AREA OF THE BLOCK THERE ARE THREE PRIMARY SCHOOLS , ST PETER'S IS MAINLY FOR ROMAN CATHOLIC PUPILS AND IS LOCATED IN BUCKPOOL. CLUNY PRIMARY IS NEARER THE CENTRE OF THE TOWN WHILE MILLBANK PRIMARY WAS OPENED IN THE EARLY 197O'S ON A SITE CLOSE TO THE NEW HOUSES ON THE SOUTHERN SIDE OF BUCKIE. HILLVIEW IS A NURSERY SCHOOL ON THE MILLBANK SITE AND THERE IS ALSO A NURSERY SCHOOL AT ST PETERS. BUCKIE HIGH SCHOOL SERVES AN AREA WHICH INCLUDES CULLEN, PORTKNOCKIE, FINDOCHTY AND PORTGORDON. THE SCHOOL PROVIDES A WIDE RANGE OF COURSES FOR 1ST TO 6TH YEAR PUPILS. BUCKIE HIGH SCHOOL HAS A ROLE OF APPROX. 96O PUPILS AND A STAFF OF 7O.
